Detailed Description

Packet to be sent to a module and check if it is there.

To be used in requests that can work with or without a certain module. For this to work, there has to be a module that answers the packets, but of a different type. After the general RequestPacket-header the format is
PosSizeComment
REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes Wanted module type

uint32  packetID = MAX_UINT32,
uint32  requestID = MAX_UINT32
) 
 

Creates a new AliveRequestPacket.

Map ID will be set to MAX_UINT32. This packet should be handled by the Reader.

Parameters:
moduleType The module type that is to be checked.
packetID The packet id of the packet. To be used by the server.
requestID The request id of the packet. Used by server.
